metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12872 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The (1) Htpasswd authentication source in the authcrypt module and (2) SimpleSAML_Session class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.11 and earlier allow remote attackers to conduct timing side-channel attacks by leveraging use of the standard comparison operator to compare secret material against user input.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
